thread.title: Fox shares up on potential Comcast offer

title: Fox shares up on potential Comcast offer
text:
Fox shares up on potential Comcast offer 9:58am EDT - 01:34
Shares of Twenty First Century Fox rose almost three percent on Tuesday after Reuters reported that cable operator Comcast Corp was preparing an all-cash bid to rival a deal agreed late last year with Walt Disney's Co. As Sonia Legg reports, Comcast has also filed for EU approval for the Sky deal. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Shares of Twenty First Century Fox rose almost three percent on Tuesday after Reuters reported that cable operator Comcast Corp was preparing an all-cash bid to rival a deal agreed late last year with Walt Disney's Co. As Sonia Legg reports, Comcast has also filed for EU approval for the Sky deal.
